text: Lou Ottens (21 June 1926 â€“ 6 March 2021) was a Dutch engineer. He worked his entire career at Philips. He was known as the inventor of the cassette tape.https://www.ed.nl/eindhoven/lou-ottens-philips-uitvinder-cassettebandje- overleden-we-waren-als-kleine-jongens-die-leuk-aan-het-spelen-waren~af8a81cd/ Ottens was born in Bellingwolde, Netherlands Ottens died on 6 March 2021 in Duizel, Netherlands at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch engineers Category:Dutch inventors Category:People from Groningen (province) Category:Mechanical engineers
title: Lou Ottens
